lead_paragraph: Liu Xiang is the first Chinese Olympic gold medalist in track and field. As a result, he is a national icon with commercial endorsements from Nike, Coca-Cola and Cadillac, among others.
snippet: Liu Xiang is the first Chinese Olympic gold medalist in track and field. As a result, he is a national icon with commercial endorsements from Nike, Coca-Cola and Cadillac, among others.
